Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.analysis

Interface CommitHistoryAnalysisTaskFactory

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface CommitHistoryAnalysisTaskFactory
Factory for tasks for HistoryAnalysis. This factory creates a task to run for a given repository and a given set of commits.
Author:
Paul Bittner

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CommitHistoryAnalysisTask
    create​(Repository repository, GitDiffer differ, Path outputPath, Iterable<org.eclipse.jgit.revwalk.RevCommit> commits)
    Create a task for the given set of commits from the given repository.

  • Method Details

    • create

      CommitHistoryAnalysisTask create​(Repository repository, GitDiffer differ, Path outputPath, Iterable<org.eclipse.jgit.revwalk.RevCommit> commits)
      Create a task for the given set of commits from the given repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - The repository for whose analysis a task should be created.
      differ - The differ that should be used to create diffs from the given commits.
      outputPath - The output path to which any results should be written on disk if necessary.
      commits - The set of commits that should be processed by the produced task.
      Returns:
      A task that process the given set of commits.
